p: The main present antioxidants are: quercetin, kaempferol, beta-sitosterol, caffeoylquinic acid, and zeatin [ 72]. It should be noted that the antioxidant power plays an important role in controlling the symptoms of the aging process and improving cardiovascular health. In addition, vitamin C and vitamin E present in M. oleifera also function as antioxidants [ 61]. In this sense, daily intake of M. oleifera will also be a contribution of antioxidants.
